import React, { useState } from 'react' import { SaveIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import axios from 'axios' export default function CustomerNew() { const [formState, setFormState] = useState({ first_name: '', last_name: '', age: undefined, }) const { first_name, last_name, age } = formState const handleInputChange = ({ target }) => { let value = target.value; setFormState({ ...formState, [target.name]: value, }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:4000/customer/', formState) .then(res => console.log(res),) .catch() } return (
